==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=树|alt=𣗬-Min}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|木|尌|c1=s|c2=p|t1=wood|ls=psc}}.

===Etymology===
Area word ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}): {{cog|lus|tuh||to plant, to sow}}, {{cog|km|ដុះ||to grow, to bud}}. {{zh-ref|Starostin}} compares it with {{cog|bo|གདོས}}, {{m|bo|གདོས་པ||mast}} and {{cog|my|ထူ||to erect (a post), to raise (a flag)}}.

Related to {{och-l|豎|to erect; to make vertical}}.
